name: Platformer (Lennert510)
description:
This is a platformer game. I've been working on it for a long time and would really appreciate it if you would download and try it out. You can always donate, but it is not mandatory at all.

I didn't make this game myself, I made this game with codemonkey's visual scripting course.

links:

Codemonkey: https://unitycodemonkey.com/

Codemonkey Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/CodeMonkeyUnity

Course: https://www.udemy.com/course/make-games-without-code-unity-visual-scripting/?cou...
